name: Goooal
storyline:
Misha imagines he's playing soccer. It helps him win in any situation. In a card game, a fight, a chess match. It's no wonder they call him the Grandmaster GOOOOAL.

Win, score, place your bets and help Misha save up for a ticket to the big game.
The enemy never rests, if you lose, Misha will return home with an empty piggy bank. Powerful soccer balls with special effects and various mini-games boosting Misha's GOOOOOOAL will aid you in the struggle.
summary: GOOOAL! is exciting sports arcade. The goal is to defeat opponents in wagers. Use powerful soccer balls with special effects and minigames. Level up your GOOOOOOAL to save up money for a ticket to the big game.
